name: Galton Board 4.7×7.1 Inch - Normal Distribution Demonstrator with Bell Curve, Acrylic Physics Lab Teaching Tool, Dalton Board Desk Toy for Stress Relief, STEM Classroom & Probability Education (Black)
short_description: Clear Normal Distribution Visualization: This Galton Board vividly demonstrates statistical laws and probability principles—steel balls bounce randomly off precision pegs, forming a perfect bell curve that turns abstract randomness into observable patterns, ideal for physics and math classrooms.

Premium Acrylic Construction: Crafted with ultra-transparent acrylic panels and precision steel balls, the 4.7×7.1 Inch (12×18cm) compact design ensures durability and clarity, perfectly aligning with the printed normal distribution curve for accurate demonstrations

Dual Purpose: Education & Stress Relief: More than a physics lab tool—this Dalton Board doubles as a calming desk toy. Watch beads transform from chaos to order, relieving work/study stress while embodying mathematical aesthetics.

Easy Interactive Operation: Simply rotate or tilt the board to release steel balls, generating real-time bell curves for instant observation. No complex setup—perfect for educators to engage students and hobbyists to explore statistical laws.

Versatile STEM Application: Beyond classrooms, it applies to finance, manufacturing, and sports—analyze asset returns, production defects, or performance distribution. A thoughtful gift for students, educators, and STEM enthusiasts.

short_description: ✔ 65 GROSS & CREEPY EXPERIMENTS – Explore the science behind the seriously disgusting! From slimy intestines and fake blood to boogers and erupting noses, this educational kit includes 25 guided experiments + 40 bonus DIYs at home.

✔ DISCOVER CHEMISTRY & PHYSICS – Each revolting experiment teaches a real scientific principle like pH changes, states of matter, acid-base reactions, or light refraction. It’s smart disguised as silly!
✔ BONUS 40 AT-HOME EXPERIMENTS – Keep the fun going with 40 DIY experiment ideas using common household items, perfect for repeat play and creative learning beyond the lab.
✔ TOOLS & INGREDIENTS INCLUDED – Each DIY activity set comes with test tubes, molds, goo powder, glow mix, colorants, slime ingredients, and more.

✔ SAFE & SUPERVISED FUN – Designed for ages 8+ with adult supervision. All materials are tested and certified safe when used according to the instructions, ensuring safe and enjoyable science exploration.
